rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C106479

self.title: CDISC SDTM Reproductive System Findings Test Code Terminology

definition: A terminology codelist for the physiological test codes related to the male and female reproductive systems.
name: Reproductive System Findings Test Code
preferredTerm: CDISC SDTM Reproductive System Findings Test Code Terminology

terms.definition: A measurement of the total number of instances in which there has been a spontaneous termination of pregnancy (miscarriage) or elective termination of pregnancy.
The method by which conception or impregnation is prevented.
A measurement of the total number of live-born offspring a female has delivered.
An indicator as to whether the female subject has the potential to become pregnant. (NCI)
The age at which the first menstruation event occurred. (NCI)
The age at which permanent cessation of menses occurred. (NCI)
The status of a female with respect to menopause.
A measurement of the total number of pregnancy events experienced by a female.
An indicator as to whether a female is pregnant during the study period. (NCI)
